article_title: Balance billing and the US health care swindle
article_text:
Whether conservative or liberal, most of us can likely agree that the state of privatized health care in the United States is an abomination compared with the rest of the developed world

Either hospital monopolies should be dissolved by regulators or should be forced to justify charges to a public commission, similar to electric utilities

Balance billing, which is illegal in most developed countries, ought to be banned in all 50 states under all circumstances

article_metadata.description: Matt Aitken: Whether conservative or liberal, most of us can likely agree that the state of privatized health care in the United States is an abomination compared with the rest of the developed world. Although the Affordable Care Act has benefited consumers by fostering competition in the health insurance marketplace, further reform is badly needed to counteract the increasing consolidation of health care providers, which is causing prices to spiral out of control.
